Articles.Content: I,ve played for half hour on PS4 and the game has frozen twice now in the VAB...

Just now, Martin Moon said:

I,ve played for half hour on PS4 and the game has frozen twice now in the VAB...

Welcome to KSP! Seriously though crashes are to be expected sadly, all you can do is report them as best as you can. Have a read of the stickied thread about bug reporting at the top of the main console support page.

 Don't let the bugs put you off, the game is life altering.
And do not lose hope, I might add. They will repair it, then you'll be up and flying in no time at all. Not only is the game life-altering, it is also life-consuming...

Altering... consuming... just come out and say it already, you know you want to:

 

KSP is Life.

i've been playing on PC for about a year, and now on PS4 for about 4 hours.  just had my first PS4 VAB Crash.  ive had this exact same crash hundreds of times in the PC version but i thought it was due to too many mods.  anyways, i was building a ship in the VAB and as soon as i clicked on a new part in the menu my entire PS4 froze up, i couldnt move anything in the game, and even my PS button would not work.  I had to use the physical power button on the PS4 Console.  also is there any other way to go into normal time warp on PS4 than to click on the bar in the top? the button combo only does the x4 physics warp
i personally salute to Flying Tiger,they ported the VAB crashes too,its a core part of the game.

I've got the same issue, the game has frozen twice at the VAB...

Edited July 19, 2016 by Fred Stark

On 13.7.2016 at 5:12 PM, adsii1970 said:

And do not lose hope, I might add. They will repair it, then you'll be up and flying in no time at all. Not only is the game life-altering, it is also life-consuming...

 

Hehe i hope so.  Am playing on xbx1 and discovert this program/game a week ago and been playing non stop ever since:) But yeah it have started to crash more and more now my saved rockets i been using houers building is gone all off em Started mining with my awesome rover on mun.  And now my save are sett way back! :s every time i save and reloade after reset game i get to the same place in game even after saves are deleted
